docs.snippet: Epiphanny Prince scored 30 points, and the host Chicago Sky recorded a 105-100 overtime win over the Liberty....
docs.lead_paragraph: Epiphanny Prince scored 30 points, and the host Chicago Sky recorded a 105-100 overtime win over the Liberty.
docs.abstract: Chicago Sky defeats New York Liberty, 105-100, in WNBA action.

docs.snippet: Mark Emmert’s testimony will be the most watched of the trial, which could reshape American college sports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mark Emmert’s testimony will be the most watched of the trial, which could reshape American college sports.
docs.abstract: NCAA president Mark Emmert is set to testify, in antitrust trial of former UCLA basketball star Ed O'Bannon, against the association over its restrictions on paying players for their images; his testimony will be the most watched of a trial that could reshape American college sports.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. President Will Get His Say at Antitrust Trial
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. President Will Get His Say at Antitrust Trial

headline.main: Music Review: Phish Plays as a Group on 'Fuego'
headline.print_headline: Music Review: Phish Plays as a Group on 'Fuego'

docs.snippet: NCAA President Mark Emmert stuck to his contention that amateurism is the core of college athletics, saying any effort to pay players would destroy a framework that has been in place for more than a century and cause many schools to either abandon...
docs.lead_paragraph: NCAA President Mark Emmert stuck to his contention that amateurism is the core of college athletics, saying any effort to pay players would destroy a framework that has been in place for more than a century and cause many schools to either abandon sports or refuse to play other schools that do pay.

headline.main: NCAA President: Pay Could Destroy College Sports
headline.print_headline: NCAA President: Pay Could Destroy College Sports

docs.snippet: A Los Angeles judge on Thursday rejected a bid by Shelly Sterling, the estranged wife of Los Angeles Clippers co-owner Donald Sterling, to issue an injunction against her husband and his legal team after her attorneys accused them of intimidation....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Los Angeles judge on Thursday rejected a bid by Shelly Sterling, the estranged wife of Los Angeles Clippers co-owner Donald Sterling, to issue an injunction against her husband and his legal team after her attorneys accused them of intimidation.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Injunction in Sterlings' Battle for Clippers
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Injunction in Sterlings' Battle for Clippers

docs.snippet: A 14-year-old, who investigators said may have been teased by the boy who was stabbed, was arrested in the attack at Intermediate School 117....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 14-year-old, who investigators said may have been teased by the boy who was stabbed, was arrested in the attack at Intermediate School 117.
docs.abstract: Police say 14-year-old Timothy Crump, student at Intermediate School 117 in the Bronx, was stabbed to death by classmate in front of school building at end of day; Noel Estevez has been arrested and charged as adult with second-degree murder and second-degree manslaughter.

headline.main: Boy, 14, Fatally Stabs Schoolmate in Bronx, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Boy, 14, Fatally Stabs Schoolmate in Bronx, Police Say

byline.contributor: J. David Goodman and Javier C. Hernández contributed reporting.
byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and COLIN MOYNIHAN

docs.snippet: For the first time, researchers have used fMRI scanners to track the brain activity of writers as they created fiction. The results have drawn strong reactions from other scientists....
docs.lead_paragraph: For the first time, researchers have used fMRI scanners to track the brain activity of writers as they created fiction. The results have drawn strong reactions from other scientists.
docs.abstract: Dr Martin Lotze study on workings of creativity, published in journal NeuroImage, examines fMRI scans of both amateur and experienced writers taken during process of written storytelling; study shows that brains of experiences writers function differently than those of amateur writers; findings have drawn mixed reactions.

headline.main: This Is Your Brain on Writing
headline.print_headline: This Is Your Brain on Writing

docs.snippet: Leonard Grant, a.k.a. Uncle Murda, chronicled his life as a Brooklyn rap performer as a colleague, Ronald Herron, known as Ra Diggs, stands trial for three killings....
docs.lead_paragraph: Leonard Grant, a.k.a. Uncle Murda, chronicled his life as a Brooklyn rap performer as a colleague, Ronald Herron, known as Ra Diggs, stands trial for three killings.
docs.abstract: Leonard Grant, known by his rap name Uncle Murda, testifies in murder and racketeering trial of Ronald Herron in Federal District Court in Brooklyn; defense is arguing that Herron, rapper also known as Ra Diggs, boasts about guns and drugs in his music in merely fictional context.

headline.seo: Uncle Murda Testifies for Defense in Ra Diggs’s Trial
headline.main: Rappers’ Lyrics and Lifestyles Scrutinized in Murder Case
headline.print_headline: Interplay Between Rappers’ Lyrics and Lifestyles Is Scrutinized in a Brooklyn Murder Case
